abstract: Let G is an arbitrary simple, connected, graph, with the vertex set V(G) and edge set E(G). In chemical graph theory, we have many invariant polynomials and topological indices for a molecular graph. The Zagreb indices are the oldest graph invariants used in mathematical chemistry to predict the chemical phenomena. In this paper, by using the definition of the multiple Zagreb indices, we computed these new topological indices for Circumcoronene Homologous Series of Benzenoid H k (k 1).
